featured.text: They construct their colonies on precious farmland, invading crops while searching for insects underground.
It immediately began to thrive in the new land and colonies spread quickly throughout the southeastern states.
Small birds such as baby quails are fair game to the expanding colony.
The trails connect the ants’ fox) is present, the pattern of their flight will colonies and sources of food, forming a sort of change immediately.
Then, almost ___(26)___ at a given signal, the group begins to march toward the colony ____(27)____.

definition.zh_def: 一群生物或人類在特定地區定居並形成社會或組織的地方。
definition.en_def: A group of organisms or people living together in a specific area, often forming a social structure or organization.
definition.example: The ant colony worked together to build their nest.
